nodes.text: Mustafar Travel Advertisement was a title of an advertisement poster which sought to lure spacers to the dangerous world of Mustafar. It was similar to the Hoth Travel Advertisement.
The poster depicted the Mensix Mining Facility, alongside a flowing river of lava with volcanoes in the background. The Aurebesh text read, "Visit the Wonder of Mustafar."
A Mustafar Travel Advertisement is a decorative item in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies which players can obtain as a loot item from the Star Wars Galaxies Trading Card Game.
